findings.title: Frontrunning market orders
findings.description: The MixinWrapperFunctions define functions for market buy/sell orders. These functions take a list of orders and a target asset amount to buy or sell. They fill each order in turn until the target has been reached, providing an appealing opportunity for frontrunning.

findings.title: By manipulating the gas limit, relayers can affect the outcome of ZeroExTransactions
findings.description: Relayers can manipulate the gas limit to affect the outcome of ZeroExTransactions by choosing a low gas limit, allowing them to control the transaction's execution.
